title: BMICH draws large crowds for Colombo Shopping Festival
body_lines: The 'Colombo Shopping Festival' kicked off at the Sirimavo Bandaranaike Hall at the Bandaranaike Memorial International Conference Hall (BMICH) yesterday ( April 7). The exhibition will be held until Monday (April 11). People have the opportunity to buy all types of household needs, footwear, garments, wood craft, and kitchenware at an attractive discounted prices up to a 50% on selected items. Pix by Kithsiri de Mel
